original_text: Saul returned to Jerusalem. He wanted to join the group of believers there. But they were all afraid of him. They did not believe that he had really become a disciple of Jesus.
korean_text: 사울이 예루살렘에 가서 제자들을 사귀고자 하나 다 두려워하여 그가 제자 됨을 믿지 아니하니

sentences.original_text: He wanted to join the group of believers there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 거기에 있는 신자들의 그룹에 합류하고 싶어했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But they were all afraid of him.
that he had really become a disciple of Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 정말로 예수의 제자가 되었다는 것을.
